title: I DC once per game for 7 seconds at a time.
body: As the title said, I just walk forward or stop and basically either miss out on a teamfight or just take a free death because I can't fight back against the adc wailing on me. I never get any lag besides this and it has lost me several ranked games. jesus christ what is causing this and can I even do anything about it.

replies.body: Are you getting fully disconnected or unable to move? The troubleshooting/fixes will be different depending on what exactly is happening. Let me know and I'll shoot you some steps to try!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BHmxE8Tz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-24T03:04:58.308+0000)
>
> Are you getting fully disconnected or unable to move? The troubleshooting/fixes will be different depending on what exactly is happening. Let me know and I'll shoot you some steps to try!

Unable to move, I lose control of my character and sometimes I can still see whats going on but most of the time everything that happened while I couldn't move appeared at once when I reconnected.

H'okay, that actually sounds like it might be packet loss causing the problem. Could you run a trace route using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1, and post those results here for me to take a look.

Sure did! This line....

| No response from host - 100 | 44 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 |

Looks a little worrisome though. That might mean your connection is getting pretty badly damaged before it reaches our servers. Do you know of any current issues with your ISP or could you reach out (and show them this data) to make sure nothing is wrong?
No, the disconnect is the only internet issue that I ever get. I don't really know how to talk to my ISP or really know what the data really means besides that it isnt good lol
